Scopronok 


Scorponok came out of the cr chamber a little groggy. He had a slight 
head ache. "Slag, Computer, reconise Sinester and Sinesis, and their
2 
love bots as enemy."

Computer:Please reconise "Love bots"

Scopronok yelled at the computer, "Twister and her Blasting sister."

computer:4 new enemys established.

Scorponok was about to blast the computer, "good." Scopornok started 
to look around, "Darkmouse, get over here, the computer is slaggiing 
up." Scopornok started to walk around. His head ache was really 
starting to hurt. he went to a medicine station. "2 Asprins, please." 
Scorponok grabbed the Asprin and swalloed them. "Slag, I'm going to 
bed." Scopronok headed for his room. He then Remmemeber his lab, 
"computer can you send some drones to clean up my lab." Scopronok 
didn't wait for a responce as he enter his room.
